io
Class ProgressMonitorReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      java.io.BufferedReader
          io.ProgressMonitorReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Readable
public class ProgressMonitorReader
extends java.io.BufferedReader

ProgressMonitorReader

Author:
Lukas Sekerak Progress Monitor ktory spolupracuje s BufferedReader, je to nahrada za ProgressMonitorInputStream ktory Reader nepodporuje. Meria aktualny proces spracovania suboru. ProgressMonitor berie INT my vsak mame data ako long. Preto sa spravi zobrazenie z [0, dlzkasuboru] na hodnotu [0, MAX]
